pkgmetadata.longdescription: # diamond4py[![pypi](https://github.com/GCS-ZHN/diamond4py/actions/workflows/pypi.yml/badge.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/diamond4py/)![license](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-GPLv3-blue.svg)![python](https://img.shields.io/badge/python->=3.7-success.svg)This is python binding for [diamond](https://github.com/bbuchfink/diamond)--a sequence alignment BLAST software implements in C++.## install- from source code```bashgit clone https://github.com/GCS-ZHN/diamond4py.gitcd diamond4pyconda create -n diamond4py python=3.8# zlib is required by diamond.conda install -c anaconda zlibpip install -v .```- from pypi```bahspip install diamond4py```## Usage```pythonfrom diamond4py import Diamond# create a objectdiamond = Diamond( database="database.dmnd", n_threads=4)# make db if you don't create it or just download one from websitesdiamond.makedb("database.fasta")print(diamond.version)# print database statistic infodiamond.dbinfo()# run blast for proteinsdiamond.blastp( query="test_proteins.fasta", out="test_output")```
